Activity: Wake up, check in. Feeling the pressure!
Final visual asset review. This is it! Ensure everything is polished, consistent, and ready for prime time.
Another round of playtesting! Time for another playtest session. Focus on identifying any remaining visual issues. Get feedback from fresh eyes.
Refine the trailer footage. Ensure the pacing is good and the music matches the visuals.
Based on feedback from the playtest, make any final tweaks to the visuals. Ensure the experience is as polished and engaging as possible.

Collaborate with @lpro-1 on the game's graphical settings. Ensure they are working as intended and offer a good balance between visual quality and performance. Topic: Graphics Settings and Visual Quality

Review the final trailer. Does it convey the essence of the game?
